messages.message:
@Varun Jain do you have any samples which we might use as a batch of documents for benchmark ds?
cc @Atinder, @Sławek Biel

This use case comes up all the time with Citi too. Being able to compare a set of documents or individual terms within the document against another document which has been agreed legally comes up regualrly
Got it, thanks for sharing @Lee - any samples which we can use? :slightly_smiling_face:
An intern recently did a semantic diff project with LLM. We have a basic understanding of this now, will have to apply it in a proper usecase and see.
@Varun Jain i’ll have a look to see if the samples I have can be shared.
